channel.title: [PI] Help Changing Hp? [PI]
channel.description:
ok so... i went to source/data/cfg/npc.cfg and changed the hp of the monster that i wanted different hp on, saved. I compiled and ran the server but when i spawn the monster and attack it it still has the same amount of hp as before i changed it... am i supposed to change it in a different spot on the source? ive looked everywhere please helpp!!!
I also tried source/bin/cfg/npc.cfg
